1343780.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #11
1343780.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #11

Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures that are 5th edition compatible.
Check out
Mini-Dungeon Monthly on Fantasy Grounds and Steam as well!
Five adventures included!
Umbravania: Dashing Through Frostyvale An adventure for three to four characters of 2nd - 4th level by Justin Andrew Mason
Fane of Burning Venom An adventure for four to six characters of 3rd-4th level by Owen K.C. Stephens
Lair of the Mother An adventure for five characters of 6th level by Brian Suskind
Halls of Rough Justice A challenging adventure for six to seven characters of 8th-9th level by Stephen Yeardley
Die Gently, Glint-Eyed! A deadly adventure for five to six characters of 20th level by Stephen Yeardley
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Aaron Gentry
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
